column5: I'm looking for some reasonably priced flyins out of La Ronge. ~ $800 - 1200 USD for Walley and Northern fishing. Does anyone have any places you would recommend?

A good fly-in north of La Ronge on Reindeer Lake is Arctic Lodges. They have a charter direct to own airstrip from Winnipeg but I'm sure would accomodate someone wanting to fly-in themselves from La Ronge. Great trophy Northern Pike and Lake Trout as well as Walleye and Arctic Grayling
Thanks. This one looks like a little more than I want to spend though.
